Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Classic skied cedar trace (loop behind bucks run) . Shallow tracks present more or less. Glide was fast, good grip too but I double poled mostly. Clean snow apart from some dried leaves on a stretch. I used good skis, glide wax was extra cold blue followed by red.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are being packed today. Not open for skiing as we prepare trails.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob will open this December 6 and 7 for skiing and riding. We anticipate having 12 runs open which includes almost every run on our frontside with the exception of Scarface, Chute and Twilight Zone. We plan to have at least 3 chairlifts open along with the rope tow. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. See you on Saturday! We will be open daily for skiing and riding beginning on December 12.
